questions.promptMd: Which change MOST increases chart integrity?

answers.contentMd: Restore a zero baseline for bars unless justified and labeled
Use many colors to attract attention
Hide axes and labels for cleanliness
answers.feedbackMd: Removes context needed to read values.

questions.promptMd: Which minimalist tweak MOST improves readability?

answers.contentMd: Direct labels on series with muted gridlines
answers.feedbackMd: Reduces legend hopping and visual clutter.

answers.contentMd: Remove all labels and rely on legend only

questions.promptMd: True or False: Truncated axes can be used if clearly justified, labeled, and not misleading.

answers.feedbackMd: Blanket bans ignore legitimate cases (e.g., temperature).
